评论详情: This is much better quality than I expected! Don’t let the stock photo fool you. It’s actually really soft and warm.
I think this sweater is really cute and flattering. I love the color I got, too!

I grabbed this sweater in black because I was looking for something casual I could dress up with boots and leggings. It was on sale and said it would arrive the next day. I wasn't sure what I would get but I love it. Super comfy. Great with leggings. Soft material, well made. I just ordered a second in a diff color. For reference, I am 150lbs, 36DD and 5'6. I ordered the large and it is fits loosely w/o looking sloppy. I didn't want it to be form-fitting. It hangs just right.

Love this sweater.  Just as pictured.  Size is accurate.  It is very soft, and fits perfectly.  Seems well made.I washed it on delicate cycle and dried in dryer with no issues.  It is a light weight sweater which I prefer.

I am so happy I bought this sweater! I want one in every color now! The cut is flattering, it’s very soft and comfortable, and a great medium-weight sweater so I’ll be able to use it for several months each year.
Fabric is not soft at all, runs very large

Not as expected. Looks like an Alfred Dunner Old Lady sweater. Blush color-Not Pink as described- totally washed me out. Sleeves Very long and fit snugly around bottom-also long. Just did Zero for me and although nicely made really looked frumpy-No other word
Nice sweater, quality material, comfortable

评论概述: Color is off but I still love it
评论详情: The color is much lighter than pictured. I would call it tan rather than brown, but it is cute, really soft, and fits well.
This was advertised as a crew neck sweater, however it is a boat neck. Returning this as the width of the boat neck is too wide.
I love this sweater!! It’s not too heavy and not scratchy at all!!
Runs a bit big, but is beautiful

The sweater fits amazingly, great material, and a good weight to it. It feels like a high quality. However, I got the lighter green color and it’s even lighter in person. It’s almost just a pale green hue instead of a sage color.
Soft, lightweight and cozy. Fit as anticipated
I LOVE this sweater. It’s lightweight and very good quality. It’s thin without being see through,  yet still a sweater. I can wear a medium or a large. I bought this in a medium & it’s perfect.
I wore this for Xmas. I love the feeling of the fabric, it’s not itchy at all. The fit is perfect & I plan on ordering more colors.
The sweater pilled before I even washed it.
I liked this sweater immediately upon opening the package. It has a hint of black thread throughout.  Medium weight and I think it fits well. It's more of a boatneck.
I usually like this brand and the garments I receive. However, the wrong product was sent and had to return.
Neckline too large
I love this sweater! Soft and comfortable and nice color. I bought to wear with my maroon pants and it's just what I hoped for! Very satisfied.
this sweater is thin and oversized. Color is beautiful, could be worn in the spring by itself or winter with an undershirt.
Great sweater . Super cute with Jeans and cute shoes
Great price and quality for price
I’m 5.3 135lbs. I ordered a medium and it swallowed me. Order a size down.

This sweater was beautiful, soft and lush when it arrived. It arrived in time, but in thin, clear plastic bag. It fits loosely, as desired and looked comfy but classy. However, after I hand washed it in cold water and laid it flat to dry (as per instructions) it is dull, pilling and no longer soft.  It’s causing me to itch, which it did not do previously. I wore it one time & washed it carefully- it should not be pilling already. I will try machine washing on gentle with a fabric softener to see if that helps at all, but the pilling will likely continue to be an issue. Sadly, I will not be buying again and cannot recommend.
Comfortable sweater to dress up and/or wear casually with leggings/jeans. Not too heavy yet keeps me warm. May buy a second one- black color this time. Recommend it!
Comfortable, true to size. Overall good purchase
Good quality sweater, good fabric supercomfortable.
Beautiful with just a touch of class!  Great fall color.
Pretty. Good weight. Big boat neck. Nicely finished. Comfortable. Wore over tee. Will size down for more.

Looks very cute online but after receiving, snags in the material and mis-shapen neck line with 4 inches of material dangling past your hands.  This is not the style, it's just seems made wrong.  I bought 2 colors and they are both made the same.

I really wasn't sure what to expect when buying this sweater. Some people said it was too light, others said it was too heavy. I find that it's on the heavier side and the color is beautiful. The sweater is also very soft. I would definitely buy this again.
Loved the sweater design but it came with a tiny rip near the neckline. Plus the color was slightly different than pictured.
The sweather felt too loose
Loved the color snd the fabrics.
I like the boat neck and pattern on the sweater. It’s soft and is great for a casual look. The green is a soft, light green.
Love how it looks, yes soft but unfortunately its itchy.  Thinner than I expected.
This thin sweater is incredibly soft. I usually wear a medium and the fit is perfect. I just got it so I cannot speak to how it will hold up over time, but my initial impression is very good.
This sweater feels nice and not itchy.
The sweater was perfect for the occasion I needed it for. The cost of the sweater was also reasonable.
GORGEOUS sweater. Make sure to order 1-2 sizes down, or you’ll have to exchange it.
I love this sweater and received several compliments while wearing it. It is lightweight and does not make me feel too warm as some sweaters do.

评论概述: Just buy smaller from your size cooler is to big need little smaller
评论详情: The neck is bigger then wanted to be and it’s hot when wear it very nice sweater. Softness but should order smaller size .
Neckline too wide. Sweater is wide across too.
Perfect. I'm 5'8", 164, usually between a Medium or Large. Got a medium, and it couldn't be more perfect.

This sweater is beautiful and soft. I bought a large but could easily have fit into a medium. I didn't exchange it because I can wear clothing under it. Considering ordering a medium in a different color.

This is my favorite sweater and I already ordered in another color. It doesn't wash the greatest, as it's gotten matted and has balled up some. That's the reason for 1 less star. But I've already worn it and washed it many times. Worth the money IMO, I'll just buy more next winter. It's very soft and has a flattering shape. It's relatively lightweight but thick enough you don't have to layer.

评论概述: What’s Not To Love About This Sweater?
评论详情: I love everything about this sweater.  I bought it in the Light Purple color and loved it so much I decided to get it in Black and Pink.  The Pink ones are GORGEOUS and look exactly like the photos. The fabric is lightweight, soft and stretchy.  The woven design is very eye catching with the diamond pattern.  The sizing is very accurate so I recommend ordering your regular size.  No need to size up for a loose fit as this sweater is designed to look a little oversized already.  I’m 5’ 6” and I weigh 145 lbs. and I got a Medium.  It fits me perfectly without looking oversized.  I will be ordering a Blue and Pink one next.  Love these sweaters!
The small wasn’t oversized at all and medium was way too big. The fabric/knit was thin but soft.
Great sweat. Medium weight. Very pretty style
I did not care for the color or the style.  The sweater was very thin and cheaply made in my opinion.

This sweater is super soft and fits very comfortably! The light green is absolutely beautiful! I'm over weight right now, rhe medium fits perfect, but for my comfort I may go L. Not sure yet. I'd like another in a different color as well.

This is one of my new favorite sweaters. It is so soft and cozy, without being too thick or hot. It is a beautiful color with a nice pattern. It feels like it is made with high quality material. i washed it in warm water in a garment bag so other items in the wash wouldn't snag it and I hung it to dry. I like that it is long enough in the back to look good with skinny jeans, but you can also slightly tuck it if you like in the front. The only thing I would change, but not a big deal, is I'm not a huge fan of the wide neck for the drop shoulder style, because my bra straps tend to be seen. I'm sure some like the drop shoulder, but not my preference. I still love this sweater though.
Fit great and so soft!

This is gorgeous, exactly how it’s pictured. It is SUPER soft and fits perfectly. It goes with everything and has delicate patterns to bring the fashion up a notch. I would buy another in a different color if I needed it. Alas, I don’t. Too bad! I highly recommend!
Way better feel to it than most cheap Chinese Amazon quality clothing items.
It is very soft, fits well, and the green color was true to the photo.
Love it!
Sweater was supper soft.  The neck is extra Swiss
It is comfortable and the size fit great.
Lightweight

评论概述: Colors are WAY off & looks cheap
评论详情: This sweater is a huge disappointment. It looks like something from a garage sale in 1988.  I ordered this in the green, which was a pretty sage green in the picture. As you can tell from the picture, this is a half white/half mint green. It is very old fashioned and cheap looking. It is also very thin- nothing about this “sweater” will keep you warm. I will be returning this as soon as possible.

This crew neck is vintage pastel pink color. The fit is just as the sizing chart says. So I would not size up, I almost did since I like my tops a bit oversized but I am glad I didn’t. Thai sweater hits at mid hip which is essential for me to hide the fupa. Material is breathable but has weight to it. Love wearing with some jeans and boots.
Washed and worn a few times. It is soft and cute!
apricot is really cream. don't manufacture know colors.  did not have on half hour and it shed (not beaded) around bust line.
This sweater is so soft!!! It’s not see through either! It worked perfectly for family photos!
Cute sweater, definitely has a wide neck! More of an off the shoulder sweater
This is a very nice sweater. Light weight but still a sweater. Very well made and the color is very pretty.
So soft and comfortable
Crewneck Sweater for Women for you to wear in the Fall. Very  Lightweight with Long Batwing Sleeve with Pullover Sweaters Tops Knit Clothes. Easy to wash and doesn’t have to be dry cleaned

This sweater is soft and a great value. The light green color is gorgeous and I love the detailing in the design- it’s understated but still present enough to make a statement. The sweater is thick enough to feel sturdy and of high quality without being overly hot.

Just out of the bag you notice its very thin, but soft. The color I got was a light minty green. I wasn't fond of the color, too light I guess. When I put it on it just hung on me. For one it was too big all around. I got my normal size but this was way to big, size down 1-2 sizes for sure. Second, I had to roll the cuff and noticed the sweater didn't have any elasticity or any means to keep its shape. I doubt it would hold up more than an hour of wear by the look and feel of it. It was returned.

I ordered 2 one pink and the other light green. They are both lovely. I ordered a medium for both and could have sized down but I like the looser fit. The green is very pretty. Here’s my measurements. 5’4 150lbs 34 D and medium fit great.
I loved the color and feel of the sweater but the unfinished neckline was a deal breaker for me.

This sweater is beyond soft and stretchy, it’s thick but not heavy. The color is stunning, I got the pink. And it’s just so flattering and nice on. I get compliments every time I wear it. I love that it’s an easy wash. It wears beautifully on its own or over another top!  Highly recommend!

评论概述: Nice weight and design- however the sweater fabric “pulls” up all over.
评论详情: Fabric pills up and sluffs  Good design but looked really old after just one days wear.
I absolutely love this sweater, it is soft and comfy and fits just right

This sweater is okay. I was kind of hoping that the quality would be a little bit better. It's a little bit flimsy in my opinion. The mint color is great and the fit was great but I was hoping for something a little bit warmer which would have provided more value.
The sweater is a good material.  The pink looks like it has been washed 100 times. Not impressed! Expected a beautiful color of pink.

评论概述: True to size fit, lightweight material
评论详情: I got this sweater for fall and winter. Right now it is still very warm out where I live, but the material is a nice lightweight knit so I am able to wear it for now until it cools down more. I got the light pink and the color is very hard to capture, it is a bit more pink than what is shown in my photo. In my review photo, you can see a detailed picture of the texture and the pattern of the weave. I like that it adds a bit of interest to the sweater.  The fit is true to size, I would recommend ordering your normal size in this sweater.

I’m absolutely loving the EVALESS Casual Crewneck Sweater for Fall! The lightweight material is perfect for those cooler autumn days without feeling too heavy. The batwing sleeves give it a relaxed, stylish vibe, and the fit is loose but flattering—great for pairing with jeans or leggings.  It’s super soft and comfortable to wear all day, whether you’re at home or out and about. The quality is excellent too; after several washes, it hasn’t lost its shape or softness. This sweater has quickly become a staple in my fall wardrobe!  Highly recommend if you’re looking for a versatile, cozy sweater for the season!
Looks great and sizing is correct
Fine

This sweater is super soft and cozy, and the batwing style is cute. It's light-medium weight. I'd say that it runs big, as I wish I had gotten a size smaller. It was too big on me, which I think made it loose its shape. Sad, because it's such a soft sweater!

This sweater is gorgeous!  I love the softness of the fabric and the pattern in the stitching.  The color is also so pretty.  I am so excited to wear this in the coming cooler weather!  It is very flattering and fits true to size.
Cloth quality is very average.

The perfect sweater! The neckline is gorgeous, the material is soft and the fit isn't too tight nor too baggy. It's also just the right thickness for the office. It's not thick, but also not see through. I love it!!

I ordered the green and it is true to its color. It has a pretty pattern and is so soft and comfortable. Its very flattering and perfect for fall as its not super heavy. It washes well and doesn't shrink at all.
I absolutely love this sweater. It's not too heavy, but the material is thick. I've worn it on cooler nights this summer, and love that I can pretty much wear this year round! Would recommend.

This is a cute sweater but doesn't fit quite right. The color is really pretty and the knitted pattern is a nice detail without adding color or actual pattern. It was a little expensive but it's definitely nice quality. It's thick and warm and the fabric is super super soft and minky. The problem is the fit. It runs big in the shoulders so it looks baggy and strange in the chest and armpit area. I have narrow shoulders so that doesn't help but I usually don't have this issue with other sweaters so this one must just run big. Other than that it's a nice sweater.

I recently purchased this casual crewneck sweater for my wife and she has been incredibly impressed with their quality and style (especially given the low price). The sweaters are made from a soft and comfortable fabric that keeps us warm without feeling bulky. The crewneck design is both classic and flattering, making them perfect for a variety of outfits.  These sweaters are ideal for fall weather and can be dressed up or down to suit any occasion. She loves the versatility and comfort of these sweaters and recommends them to anyone looking for a stylish and cozy addition to their wardrobe.
Cute sweater
Beautiful color & very soft. Comfortable wear.
This is the perfect sweater.  It's silky soft, not see through, adorable neckline.  The design and quality is outstanding - I will definitely be buying more.

This is a fabulous sweater! It is not bulky and hangs very nicely on me. I love the color and the softness. Looks great with a pair of jeans or dressier pants. Looking forward to weather cooling down a bit, when I'll be able to wear this sweater more regularly.  I'm 5'4'', 125 lbs, and the small fits me great.  Definitely recommend!

The sweater is very soft and warm. It seems to be made with quality materials. The weather is still too hot to wear the garment on a regular basis. I will update after I have worn and laundered the sweater a few times.

评论概述: Color is not what it is in the picture.
评论详情: I realllllly wanted to like this sweater. It's soft and comfy. However, it is boxy and the light pink is not shiny or as pretty of a pink as shown in the picture. The sweater is a very dull pink. Going to keep it and accessorize it up, to make it pop.
Such a soft sweater! Was afraid it would be thin but it’s thicker than I thought and of great quality. Very cute!
This sweater is really soft and comfy. I cannot wait to wear it in the cooler weather. The knitted design is nice and it can be worn with leggings or jeans. Highly recommend!
